content: This is the ruling from the same activist judge who gave it in the first place, they simply reaffirmed their initial opinion. This is a politically driven opinion and is 100% based on politics it will be overturned on appeal as it should be. Once you get passed all the smoke and mirrors and spin and name calling from the left, there is no valid reason to want to support this, voters need to prove that they are citizens with the right to vote and there is no real reason that anyone cannot easily have some sort of acceptable ID. The left is 100% behind this because it enables easy, untraceable voter fraud to take place. By any means possible.
